data.title: Demon Slayer is getting 3 special recap episodes ahead of the movie
data.meta_description: Funimation is releasing three special episodes of Demon Slayer that recap the shows first season. The episodes are designed to prep fans for the Demon Slayer: Mugen Train movie later this month. All three episodes will be available to stream on Funimations website on April 15.
data.text:
One of the specials will also include new footage

If you buy something from a Polygon link, Vox Media may earn a commission. See our ethics statement.
